百千: (ももち) - a large number; all sorts; hundreds and thousands
百千鳥: (ももちどり) - all sorts of birds/hundreds (and thousands) of birds; plover; Japanese bush warbler (Cettia diphone)/Japanese nightingale
百合: (ユリ) - lily (Lilium spp.); (ゆり, ユリ only)  comics and novels about female homosexuality
百合の木: (ユリノキ) - tulip tree (Liriodendron tulipifera); tuliptree; yellow poplar
百合の樹: (ユリノキ) - tulip tree (Liriodendron tulipifera); tuliptree; yellow poplar
百合木: (ユリノキ) - tulip tree (Liriodendron tulipifera); tuliptree; yellow poplar
百合樹: (ユリノキ) - tulip tree (Liriodendron tulipifera); tuliptree; yellow poplar
百合鴎: (ユリカモメ) - black-headed gull (Larus ridibundus); hooded gull
百名山: (ひゃくめいざん) - one hundred top mountains of Japan
百均: (ひゃっきん) - hundred-yen store; 100 yen shop
百声鳥: (ももこえどり) - lesser cuckoo (Cuculus poliocephalus)
百姓: (hyakushou) - fazendeiro, camponês, caipira; agricultura, fazendeiro, camponês, caipira; agricultura; o povo comum
百姓一揆: (ひゃくしょういっき) - (yoji) peasant's revolt
百姓読み: (ひゃくしょうよみ) - reading kanji in a nonstandard way
百害あって一利なし: (ひゃくがいあっていちりなし) - all pain, no gain; doing no good and a lot of harm; having no redeeming features; being a complete disadvantage; a hundred harms and not a single gain
百害あって一利無し: (ひゃくがいあっていちりなし) - all pain, no gain; doing no good and a lot of harm; having no redeeming features; being a complete disadvantage; a hundred harms and not a single gain
百家争鳴: (ひゃっかそうめい) - (yoji) Let a hundred schools of thought contend
百尺竿頭: (ひゃくしゃくかんとう) - (yoji) the highest state of one's enlightenment; the highest level one can attain
百年: (ももとせ) - century; hundred years; a long time
百年前: (ひゃくねんまえ) - one hundred years ago; a hundred year previously
百年戦争: (ひゃくねんせんそう) - Hundred Years War (1337-1453)
百年河清: (ひゃくねんかせい) - (yoji) waiting for one hundred years for the waters of the Yellow River to clear; waiting in vain for an unlikely event; waiting for pigs to fly; When the sky falls, we shall catch larks
百年目: (ひゃくねんめ) - the hundredth year; out of luck/(at the) end of one's rope; rare chance/unusually good fortune
百年祭: (ひゃくねんさい) - centenary; centennial celebration
百度: (ひゃくど) - hundred times; hundred degrees
百度参り: (ひゃくどまいり) - hundred times worship (e.g. visiting a shrine or temple a hundred times for prayer, walking back and forth a hundred times before a shrine offering a prayer each time)
百度石: (ひゃくどいし) - stone used as a marker for hundred times worship
百慮一得: (ひゃくりょいっとく) - (yoji) Even a fool may sometimes give good counsel
百戦百勝: (ひゃくせんひゃくしょう) - (yoji) ever-victorious; many successful campaigns; invincibility
百戦練磨: (ひゃくせんれんま) - (yoji) veteran; (someone) schooled by adversity in many battles; (someone) rich in life's experience gained through much adversity
百戦錬磨: (ひゃくせんれんま) - (yoji) veteran; (someone) schooled by adversity in many battles; (someone) rich in life's experience gained through much adversity
百折不撓: (ひゃくせつふとう) - (yoji) indefatigability; indomitableness
百撰: (ひゃくせん) - top hundred; hundred best
百日: (ひゃくにち) - hundred days; lengthy time
百日ぜき: (ひゃくにちぜき) - whooping cough; pertussis
百日の説法屁一つ: (ひゃくにちのせっぽうへひとつ) - a single mistake can ruin all one's hard work; one blunder can render useless a long period of effort; one fart in a hundred days' sermons
百日咳: (ひゃくにちぜき) - whooping cough; pertussis
百日天下: (ひゃくにちてんか) - (yoji) The Hundred Days (of Napoleon I); very short-lived regime
百日鬘: (ひゃくにちかつら) - long-haired wig used in kabuki (used metaphorically to refer to a thick growth)
百条委員会: (ひゃくじょういいんかい) - investigation committee (of prefectural assembly, established under Section 100 of the Act)
百歩譲る: (ひゃっぽゆずる) - (usu. as 百歩譲って, 百歩譲っても) to be unwilling but to give in
百歳: (ももとせ) - century; hundred years; a long time
百済: (くだら) - ancient Korean kingdom (Paekche or Kudara)
百済楽: (くだらがく) - music in the Korean court
百点: (ひゃくてん) - hundred points; perfect mark
百点満点: (ひゃくてんまんてん) - (yoji) (getting a) perfect score; scoring 100; grading students on a scale of one hundred; doing perfectly (in a test); leaving nothing to be desired
百物語: (ひゃくものがたり) - round of ghost stories (trad. at night with a lamp or candle being extinguished after each story)
百獣: (ひゃくじゅう) - all kinds of animals
百獣の王: (ひゃくじゅうのおう) - king of beasts; lion
百発百中: (ひゃっぱつひゃくちゅう) - (yoji) always hitting the bull's-eye; infallible
百眼: (ひゃくまなこ) - using multiple simple paper masks to represent different emotions in a play (from the middle of the Edo period); simple paper mask
百科全書: (ひゃっかぜんしょ) - encyclopedia; Diderot's "Encyclopedie universelle des arts et sciences"
百科全書派: (ひゃっかぜんしょは) - the Encyclopedists
百聞: (ひゃくぶん) - hearing a hundred times
百聞は一見にしかず: (ひゃくぶんはいっけんにしかず) - seeing is believing; one eye-witness is better than many hearsays; a picture is worth a thousand words
百聞は一見に如かず: (ひゃくぶんはいっけんにしかず) - seeing is believing; one eye-witness is better than many hearsays; a picture is worth a thousand words
百脈根: (ミヤコグサ) - bird's-foot trefoil (Lotus corniculatus, esp. Lotus corniculatus var. japonicus); birdsfoot trefoil
百舌: (モズ) - shrike (any bird of family Laniidae); bull-headed shrike (Lanius bucephalus)/butcher bird
百舌の早贄: (もずのはやにえ) - butcher-bird prey impaled on twigs, thorns, etc. for later consumption
百舌勘定: (もずかんじょう) - (yoji) splitting the bill so that the others end up paying the whole amount; wheedling the others into paying the whole bill
百舌鳥: (モズ) - shrike (any bird of family Laniidae); bull-headed shrike (Lanius bucephalus)/butcher bird
百般: (ひゃっぱん) - all; every; all kinds of
百花: (ひゃっか) - all varieties of flowers; many flowers
百花撩乱: (ひゃっかりょうらん) - (yoji) many flowers blooming in profusion; a gathering of many beautiful women (talented people); simultaneous emergence of many talents and achievements
百花斉放: (ひゃっかせいほう) - (yoji) "Let a hundred flowers blossom"; "Hundred Flowers" campaign
百花繚乱: (ひゃっかりょうらん) - (yoji) many flowers blooming in profusion; a gathering of many beautiful women (talented people); simultaneous emergence of many talents and achievements
百芸: (ひゃくげい) - Jack of all trades
百葉箱: (ひゃくようばこ) - Stevenson screen (louvre-sided box housing for meteorological gauges)
百薬の長: (ひゃくやくのちょう) - best medicine/chief of all medicines; sake
百貨: (ひゃっか) - all kinds of goods
百貨店: (hyakkaten) - loja de departamentos, lojas de departamentos
百足海苔: (ムカデノリ) - Grateloupia filicina (species of red alga)
